Package chessapi4j

Class PGNHandler

java.lang.Object
chessapi4j.PGNHandler
public class PGNHandler extends Object
This class provides methods and tools for manipulating and converting chess moves into PGN format.
Author:
lunalobos

    NAGS

  • Method Details

    • toSAN

      public static String toSAN(Position position, Move move)
      Converts a chess move given in Universal Chess Interface (UCI) format (Pure Coordinate Notation) to Standard Algebraic Notation (SAN) format.
      Parameters:
      position - The current position of the chess game.
      uciMove - The move in Universal Chess Interface (UCI) format to be converted.
      Returns:
      The move converted to Standard Algebraic Notation (SAN) format.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the move is illegal or cannot be converted to SAN format.

    • toSAN

      public static String toSAN(Position position, String uciMove)
      Converts a chess move given in Universal Chess Interface (UCI) format (Pure Coordinate Notation) to Standard Algebraic Notation (SAN) format.
      Parameters:
      position - The current position of the chess game.
      uciMove - The move in Universal Chess Interface (UCI) format to be converted.
      Returns:
      The move converted to Standard Algebraic Notation (SAN) format.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the move is illegal or cannot be converted to SAN format.

    • toUCI

      public static String toUCI(Position position, String sanMove)
      Converts a chess move given in Standard Algebraic Notation (SAN) to Universal Chess Interface (UCI) format (Pure Coordinate Notation).
      Parameters:
      position - The current position of the chess game.
      sanMove - The move in Standard Algebraic Notation (SAN) format to be converted.
      Returns:
      The move converted to Universal Chess Interface (UCI) format.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the given expression is not in the standard algebraic notation format.

    • parseGames

      public static List<Game> parseGames(String path)
      Parses a file containing chess game data in PGN format and returns a list of Game objects.
      Parameters:
      path - the path to the file to be parsed
      Returns:
      a list of Game objects parsed from the file
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the path is invalid or inaccessible
